18.title: Home
18.content: PD Dr. Stefan Groth – I am Privatdozent at the Department of Social Anthropology and Cultural Studies, Zurich University. Currently, I am mainly working on political narratives and on the production of Europe in everyday contexts within and outside of Europe.
